subject: Shopify 客户投诉通知
description_text:
您好！

此次之所以联系您，是为了推动解决与您的账户 0a6bb1.myshopify.com 相关的投诉。

在 2026-01-06，patrykorzel04@gmail.com 发现订单号为 6929832444218
的订单存在问题。

客户消息如下：

Hi I ordered a Clutch pedal and H shifter from the website above
on their website it states “Simsonn Plus X Pedal Clutch and
Control Box” as I ordered the clutch pedal and Shifter expected
to revive the control box as well, as it states its included in
the tittle. Further more there is not further information in the
description section about if the control box is or isn’t
included.

I attempted to contact the company to no luck they are very
reluctant to respond. At this current time both items I ordered
aren’t usable as there is no control box
客户表示曾尝试就此问题与您联系。
我们已指引客户直接与您沟通。
我们鼓励您检查问题并采取适当行动。

请记住，您有责任遵守 Shopify 的《服务条款》和《可接受使用政策》，以及任何适用法律。

谢谢！

Shopify 支持

Shopify ( https://www.shopify.com )

151 O'Connor Street, Ground floor, Ottawa, ON, K2P 2L8
